Attributes.description: An examination of financial statement information from the perspective of decision makers external to the firm, e.g., investors and financial institutions.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: COMM 293 and one of COMM 297, COMM 298 and one of COMM 370, COMM 397.
